tool_description: APITemplate.io is the newest API-based platform designed to give you two powerful APIs for your media content generation — Image and PDF
name: APITemplateio
title: APITemplateio

api_list.name: list-objects
api_list.description: Retrieves all the generated PDFs and images

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: Offset is used to skip the number of records from the results. Default to 0

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Retrieve only the number of records specified. Default to 300

api_list.name: delete-object
api_list.description: Delete a PDF or an image from CDN and mark the transaction as deleted

api_list.name: list-templates

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Retrieve only the number of records specified. Default to 300

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: Offset is used to skip the number of records from the results. Default to 0
